abstract: Brazilian police arrest Italian mob boss Pasquale Scotti, who was on run for 30 years and was convicted of killing more than 20 people in 1980s.
lead_paragraph: The suspect, Pasquale Scotti, 56, was arrested in Recife in an operation involving Brazil’s federal police and Interpol, according to a police statement.

headline.main: Brazil: After 30-Year Search, Police Arrest Italian Mob Boss
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: After 30-Year Search, Police Arrest Italian Crime Boss
